metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15927 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.20.2. An out-of-bounds access exists in the function build_audio_procunit in the file sound/usb/mixer.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
